Lets Not Forget Ourselves

author: dude1 tags: tag1 super long tag tag4 longer tag

Sourdough bread is made by the fermentation of dough using naturally-occurring lactobacilli and yeast. Sourdough bread has a mildly sour taste not present in most breads made with bakerâ€™s yeast and better inherent keeping qualities than other breads, due to the lactic acid produced by the lactobacilli.

We see an example of someone who uses drugs to escape reality. In this case the drug is biking but it could also be complemented with other stuff like cocaine.
